To understand effect disease management asthma severity utilization , review data Medicaid HMO determine number health plan member different asthma severity outcomes . This help u improve service provide patient . Data subject already exist Health Management database . We use data collect January 1 , 2000 August 18 , 2005 . We use convenience sample consist available subject meet program criterion . The total FHP database include approximately 50,000 member approximately 6,000 identified asthma . We create research database contain patient-specific data . Instead , intermediate workstation program query health management database send result aggregated de-identified data research database analysis another workstation . The research database never contain patient identifier contain individual patient data . It contain aggregated data provide intermediate query workstation . Here complete list variable house research database subsequent analysis : Categorical variable : Asthma severity ( intermittent , mild , moderate severe persistent ) , Provider office , Quarter see , Medication type ( controller reliever ) , Age category ( 0-4 , 5-9 , 10-17 , > 17years ) , active status ( active inactive ) , Location ( ER , Inpatient , Routine visit ) , Case manage ( yes , ) , Gender , Psychosocial issue , Diagnosis ( asthma , asthma ) Continuous variable : Cost care , Number visit , Number prescription , Number member category , Mean Quality life
